statements: SELECT * FROM voter_registration;
SELECT name, address FROM voter_registration;
SELECT id, name, address FROM voter_registration WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM voter_registration WHERE address LIKE 'Main Street%';
SELECT id, identification_number FROM voter_registration ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, address, identification_number FROM voter_registration WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM voter_registration WHERE identification_number = 'ABC123';
SELECT name, address FROM voter_registration WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM voter_registration WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT id, name FROM voter_registration WHERE address IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles', 'Chicago') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM voter_info;
SELECT name, address FROM voter_info;
SELECT id, name, address FROM voter_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM voter_registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(*) FROM voter_registration GROUP BY voter_id;
SELECT * FROM voter_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM voter_info WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_voters FROM voter_info;
SELECT id, registration_date FROM voter_registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT vi.id, vi.name, vr.registration_date FROM voter_info vi INNER JOIN voter_registration vr ON vi.id = vr.voter_id;
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT name, address FROM voters WHERE id = 100;
SELECT id, name, address FROM voters WHERE identification_number = '123456789';
SELECT registration_date, party_affiliation FROM voter_history WHERE voter_id = 200 ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT status_description FROM voter_status WHERE status_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT id, name, address FROM voters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT v.name, vh.registration_date, vs.status_description FROM voters v LEFT JOIN voter_history vh ON v.id = vh.voter_id LEFT JOIN voter_status vs ON vh.history_id = vs.status_id;
SELECT name, address FROM voters WHERE identification_number LIKE 'A%';

SELECT v.name, vh.registration_date, vs.status_description FROM voters v JOIN voter_history vh ON v.id = vh.voter_id JOIN voter_status vs ON vh.history_id = vs.status_id ORDER BY vh.registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, address FROM voters ORDER BY voter_id DESC;
SELECT voter_name, address, identification_number FROM voters WHERE voter_id = 3;
SELECT v.voter_name, va.city FROM voters v JOIN voter_addresses va ON v.voter_id = va.voter_id WHERE va.state = 'New York';
SELECT vi.*, v.voter_name AS voter_name FROM voter_identifications vi JOIN voters v ON vi.voter_id = v.voter_id WHERE vi.issue_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT voter_name, address, identification_number FROM voters ORDER BY voter_name DESC;
SELECT voter_id, city, state FROM voter_addresses WHERE postal_code='12345';
SELECT * FROM voter_identifications WHERE issue_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;

SELECT v.voter_name, vi.identification_type, vrs.registration_status FROM voters v JOIN voter_identifications vi ON v.voter_id = vi.voter_id JOIN voter_registration_status vrs ON v.voter_id = vrs.voter_id WHERE vrs.registration_status='Active';
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT name, address FROM voters WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM voter_addresses ORDER BY state, city;
SELECT voter_id, registration_date, status FROM voter_history WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT role_id, role_name, grant_date FROM voter_roles WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM voters WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT address, city, state FROM voter_addresses WHERE zip_code = '12345';
SELECT id_id, id_type, issue_date, expiration_date FROM voter_identifications WHERE voter_id = 3;
SELECT voter_id, registration_date, status, voting_history FROM voter_history WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT role_id, role_name, grant_date, expiry_date FROM voter_roles WHERE voter_id = 2;
